name: Blocky Copy
description:
Blocky Copy is a simple yet fun game about matching little patterns of blocks as quickly and accurately as possible, it may sound easy, but be warned; things can get challenging pretty fast.

Level Creator

Blocky Copy has a level creator, feel free to share and download zipped folders of level files in the discussion board below, good level packs will be pinned.

The $2 Pack

The full game of Blocky Copy is completely free, but if you decide to give us $2 or more you will get the original soundtrack, a pack of 15 Halloween themed levels and an unpolished prototype of Blocky Copy as a reward.

Contact

To contact us for example if you find a bug or have a cool idea for a new feature either make a thread in the discussion board or email us at

meepandastudios@gmail.com
